name: Egg fried rice
instructions: Prep the ingredients. Mince 2 garlic cloves. Chop 2 spring onions.
Heat up 2 tbsp vegetable oil in pan.
Add 1 tbsp soy sauce and 1 tbsp sesame oil. Stir.
Add spring onion as garnish. Stir a little and serve.

name: Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook 2 servings of pasta until al dente.
Heat up 1/4 cup olive oil in pan.
Add the garlic. Saute till lightly golden.
Add the pasta and 1/4 cup of pasta water. Toss till evenly coated with sauce.
Add parsley as garnish and serve.

name: Spicy Garlic Shrimp
instructions: Prep the marinade. Combine 3 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oyster sauce and 1 tbsp siracha sauce.
Heat up 1tbsp vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
Cook the shrimp for 2-3 minutes on each side, until the shrimp turn pink and opaque.
Garnish with chopped spring onions and serve with rice.
